#summary GWT Portlets user manual
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

The GWT Portlets framework user manual is included in the download distribution (PDF and single HTML page). It is also available online in several formats:

  * [http://gwtportlets.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/doc/manual.pdf PDF]
  * [http://gwtportlets.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/doc/manual.html Single HTML page]
  * [http://gwtportlets.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/doc/index.html Multiple HTML pages]

The source for manual is in subversion (Docbook V4.5).
